com.turn.torrent.tracker.simple

Class SimpleTracker

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.turn.torrent.tracker.simple.SimpleTracker

  • public class SimpleTracker
extends java.lang.Object
    BitTorrent tracker.

    The tracker usually listens on port 6969 (the standard BitTorrent tracker port). Torrents must be registered directly to this tracker with the addTorrent(TrackedTorrent torrent) method.

      • getAnnounceUrls

        @Nonnull
public java.util.List<java.net.URL> getAnnounceUrls()
                                             throws java.net.SocketException
        Returns the full announce URL served by this tracker.

        This has the form http://ip:port/announce.

        Throws:
        java.net.SocketException

        Start the tracker thread.
        Throws:

      • stop

        public void stop()
          throws java.io.IOException
        Stop the tracker.

        This effectively closes the listening HTTP connection to terminate the service, and interrupts the peer collector thread as well.

        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
